summary: This is an email chain from June 3, 2008, regarding the forwarding of a signed letter and attachments related to the Epstein case from the First Assistant U.S. Attorney for the Southern District of Florida. It discusses sending hard copies via FedEx.

events.title: Forwarding of Epstein Letter
events.description: An email chain discusses sending a signed letter with attachments regarding the Epstein case from the First Assistant U.S. Attorney's office via FedEx.

keyFacts: The document is an email chain dated June 3, 2008, concerning the Epstein case.
It references a signed letter from the First Assistant U.S. Attorney for the Southern District of Florida with attachments.
The correspondence indicates the letter and attachments were to be sent via FedEx.
The email originated from the U.S. Attorney's Office in the Southern District of Florida.
No specific individuals are named in the provided text excerpt.
